name: Game of Airships
description:
(DISCLAIMER:  Takes a bit of time to load)

Welcome to Game of Airships!  A turn based strategy card game made in a week for the East Coast Student Game Jam.

Take to the skies in an airship and take down those rambunctious pirates!

Made by Elwood Hogan and Philip Bixby.

If you find any bugs feel free to let me know at Admiral_Apple#1094

The bugs we are currently aware of:

Omega blast can destroy already destroyed enemies.

Tesla coil can damage the boss multiple times.
